document_data.name: ''Mercykiller Ring''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Mercykiller rings''''' were [[enchanted]] [[ring]]s worn by the members of the [[Mercykillers]] of the planar city of [[Sigil]].
document_data.Powers: The wearers of these rings received its magical boons that included enhanced abilities to hide in shadows, to move silently, and to set traps.
document_data.History:
''Mercykiller rings'' were handed out to the [[assassin]]s of the Mercykillers who were tasked with ending lives of those who broke laws of Sigil. These Mercykiller assassins were known to be dispatches across the multiverse, including the [[Prime Material plane]].

While it was unknown how a ''mercykiller ring'' appeared on [[Toril]], it came into the possession of a merchant named [[Deidre]], a member of [[Aurora's Magic Emporium]], during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. Sometime prior to the {{YearlinkName|1369}} she began selling her wares in the [[Adventurer Mart]] of [[Athkatla]].
